title: Paul Kossoff - Back Street Crawler (1973; 2008 Deluxe Edition) [
description:
an almost perfect deluxe edition of a legendary album

Ex-Free-guitarist Paul Kossoff's debut solo album

tracks 1-5 are from the original album - the rest is bonus material from the same sessions, including a 38-minutes-jam-version of 'Time away'
